metadata.title: Islet
metadata.shortDescription: A small islet with a palm tree in the middle of the sea.
metadata.longDescription: A small islet stands out in the calm sea. On it stands a palm tree with coconuts. A crab smiles happily on the islet. In the distance, larger islands and their snow-capped mountains can be seen. The sun shines high in the sky, partially obscured by the palm tree.

hotspots.title: Palm leaf
hotspots.description: Large drooping leaf that starts from the center of the tip of the palm.

hotspots.title: Coconut
hotspots.description: Perfectly spherical in shape, the coconut displays light reflections.

hotspots.title: Islet
hotspots.description: The islet is small and shaped like a small hill, appearing to be covered in sand. Its shape is simple and round.

hotspots.title: Crab
hotspots.description: The crab smiles as it raises its claws to the sky. It has two large eyes on its head and six small legs under its body.

hotspots.title: Island
hotspots.description: The island is far away and stands out against the sea, above the horizon. Snow-capped mountains can be seen on it.

hotspots.title: Sun
hotspots.description: The sun shines high in the sky, partially obscured by the palm tree. It has rays all around it.

hotspots.title: Palm trunk
hotspots.description: The trunk is slightly crooked and uneven. The base is thicker than the top. It has irregular horizontal lines.

hotspots.title: Grass leaf
hotspots.description: The grass leaf grows upwards from the shoulders of the lower part of the palm.

hotspots.title: Sea
hotspots.description: The sea surrounds the islet. Its water is calm, and the waves only ripple slightly when they crash against the base of the island.
